description: Tree work in conservation area. Pruning of 1. Almond - prunus dulcis. works: Remove twisting branch back to trunk and tidy up. 2. Quince - Cyelonia japonica - Works: Remove crossing branches. Prune back and tidy up. 3. Katsura Tree - Cercidiphyllum Works: Raise to give 8'0' clearance and crown thin by up to 20%. Reshape and balance. 4. Cherry - Prunus 'Kanzan'. Works: Remove crossing branches. Remove 2 small branches over gate and lift over pavement. Raise spread by up to 6'-8' and crown thin by20% leaving a balanced crown. 5. Magnolia - Soularigiana. works: Raise lower branch to give at least 8' clearance and thin 20%. 6. Cherry - 'Cheal's' Weeping - works: Removing crossing branches and ties. Deadwood and balance.
decision_conditions: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
